paint

Enum PaintCanvas.Pen

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<PaintCanvas.Pen>
      • paint.PaintCanvas.Pen
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<PaintCanvas.Pen>
    Enclosing class:
    PaintCanvas

    public static enum PaintCanvas.Pen
extends java.lang.Enum<PaintCanvas.Pen>
    PaintCanvas Pen for drawings. Set a PaintCanvas' pen field using one of those Pens. Each pen correspond to a unique shape to be added when drawing on the canvas. FREE_DRAWING is for hand drawing and TEXT is used to add text on the image. Note that when using TEXT, the PaintCanvas will first prompt a dialog so as to type the text before adding it to the image.
